string.value: Power B. Fore, the instructor at the training center, claims to know the weakness of Pigs. You'd better go hear what he's got to say.
You acquired the Pig's Weakness skill. You should take advantage of the skill when hunting Pigs.\r\n\r\n#o1210100# #a24261#
You used Pig's Weakness to effectively hunt Pigs.
Okay, now you have mastered the Weaken the Pig skill, right? Now let's use it to hunt some Pigs.\r\n#b#L0#How do I use this skill?#l\n#k
There's no need to worry about that now. The skill will be applied regardless of the type of attack you are using. You see the Pig's weak points? Try eliminating around 40 of them!
If you don't want to do it, I have to say, it's your loss.
Okay, okay. Great work! You look like you can see and attack the weak points of the Pigs.\r\n#b#L0#Do other monsters have their weak points as well?#l\n#k

That is an excellent, excellent question! Monsters' weak points have yet to be revealed to everyone, but I do believe they will become known someday. I was able to find the weak points of these monsters, but I didn't train hard enough to make myself a famous adventurer. But I have a feeling you have the potential to achieve much more than that.
Keep training. Don't stop until you become a famous adventurer!
I don't think you have slain 40 Pigs yet.
